node.title: Retrowave
node.excerpt: A sleek and retro-inspired dark theme.

node.title: Moonlight
node.excerpt: Adds a dark blue theme, with light colors.

node.title: Table2
node.excerpt: Read and write cloud-stored spreadsheets with a sheet.best API URL

node.title: Blue theme for epic people
node.excerpt: A blue theme for you epic people who like to swim deep into the ocean in Minecraft.

node.title: Ravager Preset
node.excerpt: A plugin that adds a ravager preset

node.title: Basic Animated Background-Theme
node.excerpt: This theme uses properties never used before to create a really awesome looking animated background to level up your bridge. experience. For Dark Theme users ONLY.

node.title: Desert Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a desert-inspired theme to select inside the settings window

node.title: Coffee Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a coffee theme to select inside the settings window, additionally replacing some navigation icons. Caffeine not included.
